questions.text: When your chains were informed of the competitive exclusivity test, what was their reaction/comment?
When your independent stores were informed of the competitive exclusivity test, what was their reaction/comments?
answers: VERY LITTLE REACTION FROM RETAILERS. JHEY WEE NOT CONCERNED ABOUT THE LACK OF LILLAD

questions.text: Do you feel the exclusivity test will benefit or have a negative impact on Lorillard business (Please Explain)?
answers: I MAY HAVE SOME NEGATIVE IMPACT CHARLEY AND SNLE RECAUSE WE SEEM DEPENDENT ON COUPONS/STCKERS FOR SALES. JOBABLY WILL NOT AFFECT NEWPORT

questions.text: Any other comments, suggestions or problems?
answers: HE OVERAL EFFECT ON STYLE AND HARLEY MAY NOT BE VERY GRCAT SINCE WE HAVE LIMITED DISTRIBUTION ON BO BRAS. WEE WE DO NOT HAVE A MERCHANDISING AGREEMENT
